import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Get asset details
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/networks/{network}/blockchains/{blockchainId}/assets/{assetId}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets asset details corresponding to the given asset id on the X-Chain.

## Request

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"blockchainId","required":true,"in":"path","description":"A primary network blockchain id or alias.","example":"x-chain","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["2oYMBNV4eNHyqk2fjjV5nVQLDbtmNJzq5s3qs3Lo6ftnC6FByM","2JVSBoinj9C2J33VntvzYtVJNZdN2NKiwwKjcumHUWEb5DbBrm","x-chain"],"title":"XChainId"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"network","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Either mainnet or a testnet.","example":"mainnet","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["mainnet","fuji"],"title":"Network"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem><ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"assetId","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Asset ID for any asset on X-Chain","example":"th5aLdWLi32yS9ED6uLGoMMubqHjzMsXhKWwzP6yZTYQKYzof","schema":{"type":"string"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><div>
  <div>
    <ApiTabs
      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem
        label={"200"}
        value={"200"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          
          
          
        </div><div>
          <MimeTabs
            className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
            schemaType={"response"}
          >
            <TabItem
              label={"application/json"}
              value={"application/json"}
            >
              <SchemaTabs
                className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}
              >
                <TabItem
                  label={"Schema"}
                  value={"Schema"}
                >
                  <details
                    style={{}}
                    className={"openapi-markdown__details response"}
                    data-collapsed={false}
                    open={true}
                  >
                    <summary
                      style={{}}
                      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}
                    >
                      <strong>
                        Schema
                      </strong>
                    </summary><div
                      style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      
                    </div><ul
                      style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"assetId"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"Unique ID for an asset.","example":"th5aLdWLi32yS9ED6uLGoMMubqHjzMsXhKWwzP6yZTYQKYzof"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"name"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of this asset.","example":"Avalanche"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"symbol"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"Symbol for this asset (max 4 characters).","example":"AVAX"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"denomination"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"number"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"number","description":"Denomination of this asset to represent fungibility.","example":9}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"type"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"PrimaryNetworkAssetType"}
                        qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`secp256k1`, `nft`]"}
                        schema={{"example":"secp256k1","type":"string","description":"Type of asset like SECP256K1 or NFT.","enum":["secp256k1","nft"],"title":"PrimaryNetworkAssetType"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"createdAtTimestamp"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"number"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"number","description":"Timestamp in seconds this asset was created on.","example":1675444720}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"cap"}
                        required={true}
                        schemaName={"PrimaryNetworkAssetCap"}
                        qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`fixed`, `variable`]"}
                        schema={{"example":"fixed","type":"string","description":"Cap represents if an asset is a variable or fixed cap asset.","enum":["fixed","variable"],"title":"PrimaryNetworkAssetCap"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
                >
                  <ResponseSamples
                    responseExample={"{\n  \"assetId\": \"th5aLdWLi32yS9ED6uLGoMMubqHjzMsXhKWwzP6yZTYQKYzof\",\n  \"name\": \"Avalanche\",\n  \"symbol\": \"AVAX\",\n  \"denomination\": 9,\n  \"type\": \"secp256k1\",\n  \"createdAtTimestamp\": 1675444720,\n  \"cap\": \"fixed\"\n}"}
                    language={"json"}
                  >
                    
                  </ResponseSamples>
                </TabItem>
              </SchemaTabs>
            </TabItem>
          </MimeTabs>
        </div>
      </TabItem>
    </ApiTabs>
  </div>
</div>
